description: PM Modi chairs his 9th interaction through #PRAGATI PM Modi urges Secretaries to set up system for top-level monitoring of grievances immediately PM Narendra Modi reviews progress of vital #infrastructure projects in road, railway, coal, power and renewable energy sectors PM Modi reviews progress of…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Issues discussed during today's PRAGATI interaction include progress of UDAY & implementation of National Old Age Pension Scheme. Discussions were held on significant projects like Mumbai Trans-Harbour Link, DMIC & Jal Marg Vikas Project from Allahabad to Haldia.

Also called for top-level monitoring of people's grievances relating to the customs and excise sector. http://nm-4.com/51ae
